text: Steps Turn on your PSP.  Turn the game on. You and your friend must have the same game which is the same type(PAL or NTSC). Make sure that there is a multiplayer option in the game.  Make sure that the WLAN switch is 'on'. 1 of you must decide to 'host' the game and make all settings. The others may click on 'join game' or something like that.  Enjoy.  A Variation Instead of the ad hoc mode, choose  the infrastructure mode, to play over the net.  You must follow other conditions i.e. type,  wlan etc.
